abstract.text: The root object representing a Stream Chat.

inlineContent.text: Typically, an app contains just one instance of
. However, it’s possible to have multiple instances if your use
case requires it (i.e. more than one window with different workspaces in a Slack-like app).

abstract.text: The root object representing a Stream Chat.
that will create a new channel, if the channel doesn’t exist already.
that will create a new channel with the provided members without having to specify
the channel id explicitly. This is great for direct message channels because the channel should be uniquely identified by
its members. If the channel for these members already exist, it will be reused.

for the channel with the provided id.
